name: Dice Knight 2600
description:
Welcome to the Die Tower! To defeat your foes and ascend the tower, you must master the use of your magic Dice Roll. Can you clear all the rooms and defeat the boss to claim your prize?

10 Rooms of turn-based strategic combat!

5 enemy types and 1 Boss!

5 different endings!

Works on real GBC hardware!

Dice Rolls!

Instructions:

Use the arrow keys to pick your direction and press Z to move in said direction one space. While standing still press X to attack.

Player movement increases their die roll, allowing them to defeat stronger foes until the die hits it's max and resets back to 1.

Every time an enemy hits you, your Dice Roll decreases. If you take a hit at 1, you'll take one heart of damage. Lose all your hearts and you'll have to start the room over again!

2+ Goblins; they're weak but everywhere.

2+ Ghosts; they can't hurt you, but they stop you from moving. Attack while facing them to defeat them.

3+ Skeletons; tougher than Goblins but otherwise unremarkable.

4+ Evil Knights; they hit the hardest and have the highest defense. Don't let them corner you!

0+ Zombies; meat shields. They're slow and weak but take two hits to take down.

0? Chest; here is where your prize awaits.

5+ Boss; the Master of the tower can only be damaged when you're on your highest roll!
